articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Mustafa Al-Bassam
To my knowledge, with almost 1000 participants, this is the largest incentivized testnet in blockchain history.
One of the core values of Celestia is that users should be first-class citizens of the network.
That's why this testnet will have 700+ data sampling light nodes. https://twitter.com/CelestiaOrg/status/1633135451640061952

Celestia: Today officially marks the beginning of the Blockspace Race, Celestia’s incentivized testnet program 🏁
Validators have now entered into phase 1: liftoff. https://t.co/iiAsGLWawo

• 1-page cheatsheet
• Quests + Prizes 🏆 (coming soon)

articles.description:
RT turja.eth 🕺
Re @developer_dao hacker scholarship was a success 🙌🏽
It was so exciting to launch this MVP program at @EthereumDenver and even more pumped to share what we've got planned 👀
Thank you @fuel_network & @fluence_project for helping us make this possible 🚀 https://twitter.com/kirstenrpomales/status/1632569875905363968

Kirsten is 𝔟𝔲𝔦𝔩𝔡𝔦𝔫𝔤 TalentLayer.lens: Thank you @developer_dao for bringing the @TalentLayer team to @EthereumDenver w a scholarship! We shipped a decentralized RPC "BetteRPC" on @fluence_project ❤️ shout-out 2 @mannyornothing  @boneyard935011 @eponomarev @mattiapomelli @mart1gone @quentdc043 @Romain__TL @carllippert https://t.co/yDq469gPEz

articles.description:
RT Gitcoin Passport — Sybil Defense. Made Simple.
🚨 BIG ANNOUNCEMENT 📣
After months of hard work, we’re THRILLED to announce the launch of the @GitcoinPassport Scorer API, which makes it 10x easier than before to “Passport-gate” your web3 project.
Read further to learn how to use this new API 🧵 https://t.co/0kVNy3OUq1
